definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)

sentences.english: Organic essential oils of fennel, bergamot, verbena and cedarwood essential oils.
sentences.chinese: 茴香，佛手柑，马鞭草，雪松等有机单方精油。

sentences.english: Liu cracked his whip violently across the head of the mule pulling Trinket's cart.
sentences.chinese: 刘一舟手中马鞭挥出，向大车前的骡子头上用力抽去。

sentences.english: Calendula may mix with lemon slice, peppermint, blue mallow or Verbena.
sentences.chinese: 金盏花可配搭柠檬片，薄荷，紫罗兰或马鞭草。

sentences.english: Yes, my husband and I only have left what his parents left him.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我丈夫和我只剩下我公婆留下的一点马鞭草。

sentences.english: Ginger root, verbena, ginseng, black pepper.
sentences.chinese: 姜块，马鞭草，西洋参，黑胡椒。

sentences.english: Is this whip I prepared up to standard?
sentences.chinese: 我准备的这条马鞭够水准吧？

sentences.english: Elegantly presented in a glass spray bottled engraved with a verbena leaf.
sentences.chinese: 它的瓶子上非常优雅地雕刻了一片马鞭草叶。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo optimize the extraction process of polysaccharide from D. fimbriatum Hook. var. oculatum Hook by ultrasonic hot reflux assisted.
sentences.chinese: 目的优选超声波辅助热回流法提取马鞭石斛多糖工艺。

sentences.english: Or planting a hanging basket with dwarf tomatoes and edge it with verbena?
sentences.chinese: 或者再放个吊篮种上土豆，盆边上再种些马鞭草？

sentences.english: Yellowstone sand verbena are endemic to the Yellowstone's lakeshores.
sentences.chinese: 黄石沙地马鞭草是黄石公园湖边特有的植物。

definition: to urge on a horse using a whip or spurs
to whip on/to raise a whip/by ext. to swagger
to shout an order or command
horse's head/same as 碼頭|码头[ma3 tou2], pier
to turn/to turn around/to transfer (funds etc)
